description: EDITABLE AI MODELS LIST - Add/remove/edit any AI you want

cursor.name: Cursor AI
cursor.notes: Best for: Code completion, refactoring, debugging

github-copilot.name: GitHub Copilot++
github-copilot.notes: Best for: Code generation, documentation, test writing

claude-sonnet.name: Claude Sonnet 4
claude-sonnet.description: Best value AI - Excellent for everything

gemini-flash.name: Gemini 2.0 Flash
gemini-flash.description: FREE - Fastest, massive context, excellent quality
gemini-flash.notes: Best for: Speed, long documents, FREE usage

chatgpt-free.name: ChatGPT Free
chatgpt-free.description: FREE - GPT-4o mini via web interface
chatgpt-free.notes: Best for: General questions, writing, brainstorming

llama-3.3.name: Llama 3.3 70B
llama-3.3.description: FREE - Open source, runs locally or via Together AI
llama-3.3.notes: Best for: Privacy, local processing, offline use

perplexity.name: Perplexity AI
perplexity.notes: Best for: Research, current events, fact checking

huggingface.name: HuggingFace Chat
huggingface.description: FREE - Access to multiple open source models
huggingface.notes: Best for: Experimentation, open source, testing

poe-ai.name: Poe AI
poe-ai.description: FREE - Access Claude, GPT-4, multiple bots
poe-ai.notes: Best for: Multiple models, conversation, testing

phind.name: Phind
phind.notes: Best for: Coding help, documentation, debugging

ollama-local.name: Ollama (Local)
ollama-local.description: FREE - Run AI models locally on your Mac
ollama-local.notes: Best for: Privacy, offline, unlimited use

codeium.name: Codeium
codeium.description: FREE - Forever free AI coding assistant
codeium.notes: Best for: Code completion, chat, free forever

you-com.name: You.com AI
you-com.description: FREE - AI search engine with chat
you-com.notes: Best for: Web search, research, summaries

lm-studio.name: LM Studio
lm-studio.description: FREE - GUI for running local AI models
lm-studio.notes: Best for: Easy local setup, no coding, privacy

blackbox-ai.name: Blackbox AI
blackbox-ai.notes: Best for: Code search, snippets, quick answers

instructions.how_to_edit: Edit this file directly in any text editor. Change enabled to true/false to enable/disable models. Add new models by copying existing format.
instructions.how_to_add_model: Copy an existing model block, change the values, give it a unique key, save the file.
instructions.how_to_disable: Set 'enabled: false' for any model you don't want to use
instructions.how_to_change_hotkey: Edit the hotkeys section with your preferred keyboard shortcuts
instructions.reload: Save this file, then restart AI GENIUS or refresh the web dashboard
